#  Careers at  Omniscien Technologies

##  Join the  Omniscien Team

Are you a creative thinker?  
Are you passionate about innovation?  
Do you enjoy a challenge?

At Omniscien, we are always looking for great talent. We are language
aficionados and technology enthusiasts that thrive on a challenge and breaking
new ground. Our team provides award-winning solutions based on a solid
foundation of machine learning and artificial intelligence. Our employees
collaborate across languages and borders, helping each other, and helping our
customers to grow from shared expertise. Explore our career opportunities
today.** **If there is one thing that has led to our success, it can simply be
reduced to a single word – “Team”**

![Team](https://omniscien.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/07/Team2.jpg)

##  Full-Time Positions

##### [Artificial Intelligence (AI) and Natural Language Processing (NLP)
Engineer](https://omniscien.com/job/ai-engineer-bangkok/)

Bangkok, Full-time

We are looking for an AI and NLP Engineer to join in our R&D; team in Bangkok.

[Learn More](https://omniscien.com/job/ai-engineer-bangkok/)

##### [NLP and Machine Learning Engineer](https://omniscien.com/job/nlp-and-
machine-learning-engineer/)

Bangkok, Full-time

[Learn More](https://omniscien.com/job/nlp-and-machine-learning-engineer/)

##  Part-Time Positions

There are currently no job vacancies in this category.

##  Internships

##### [Artificial Intelligence Internships available now! (Bangkok,
Thailand)](https://omniscien.com/job/artificial-intelligence-internships-
available-now-bangkok-thailand/)

Bangkok, Intern

We are currently looking for interns with Artificial Intelligence (AI) skills
who can learn and apply their skills in an exciting and fast-moving, leading-
edge environment!

[Learn More](https://omniscien.com/job/artificial-intelligence-internships-
available-now-bangkok-thailand/)

##### [NLP Internships available now! (Bangkok,
Thailand)](https://omniscien.com/job/nlp-internships-available-in-now-bangkok-
thailand/)

Bangkok, Intern

We are currently looking for interns with Natural Language Processing (NLP)
skills who can learn and apply their skills in an exciting and fast-moving,
leading-edge environment!

[Learn More](https://omniscien.com/job/nlp-internships-available-in-now-
bangkok-thailand/)

##  We are  Here to Help

For general and sales inquiries, please use the form below.

For technical support queries, please use the [Technical Support
Form](/support/).

Alternatively, please feel free to contact us using any of the contact details
to the right.

#  Introducing  Omniscien Technologies

## Enterprise-Class Neural Machine Translation and Language Processing
Technologies

## Human Language Technology Enhanced by Artificial Intelligence

Omniscien products, automation technologies, and language processing solutions
augment human Intelligence. Underpinned by state-of-the-art machine learning
and artificial intelligence, we enable machines to work more like humans so
that humans don't have to work more like machines. Omniscien's Enterprise
Machine Translation software provides a core architecture for neural machine
translation and

Enterprise
Machine Translation software provides a core architecture for neural machine
translation and custom machine translation engines that are adapted and
optimized for specific purposes such as subtitles, captions, patents,
automotive, and life sciences.

##  Artificial Intelligence Built for  Smart Language Processing

##  Artificial Intelligence Built for  Smart Language Processing

![Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, Natural Language Processing, and
Machine Translation](https://omniscien.com/wp-
content/uploads/2020/07/TrainMT2-300x300.png)

##  Data is the Fuel that Powers Artificial Intelligence

##  Data is the Fuel that  
Powers Artificial Intelligence

Built on the world's leading translation, language processing, workflow
automation, and artificial intelligence technologies.

Translation and language processing technologies have evolved substantially
over the last decade. The Omniscien team has been at the forefront of research
and development, leading the way with a [comprehensive set of integrated
tools, features, and technologies](technology/index.html) that are powered by
and drive artificial intelligence and machine learning.

Naturally, Omniscien tools and technologies are heavily reliant on high-
quality specialized data to power our platform and technologies. Because we
understand the importance of high-quality data, the Omniscien team is
dedicated to breaking new ground with novel research and approaches to
creating, mining, harvesting, synthesizing, and manufacturing data. Omniscien
has built a variety of [powerful tools for data creation, preparation, and
analysis](machine-translation/powerful-tools-for-data-creation-preparation-
and-analysis/index.html).

Behind many of the tools design is Omniscien’s Chief Scientist, Professor
Philipp Koehn who leads our team of researchers and developers. Philipp is a
pioneer in the machine translation space, his books on [Statistical Machine
Translation](https://www.amazon.com/Statistical-Machine-Translation-Philipp-
Koehn/dp/0521874157 "Statistical Machine Translation") and [Neural Machine
Translation](https://www.amazon.com/Neural-Machine-Translation-Philipp-
Koehn/dp/1108497322 "Neural Machine Translation") are the leading academic
textbooks globally on machine translation. Both books are available now from
Amazon.com or leading book stores.

![Philipp Koehn](https://omniscien.com/wp-
content/uploads/2020/07/Koehn-1721.jpg)

Professor Philipp Koehn,  
Chief Scientist,  
Omniscien Technologies.

[![Neural Machine Translation - Philipp Koehn - Book
Cover](https://omniscien.com/wp-
content/uploads/2020/07/51dmGDrqsML1-210x300.jpg)](https://www.amazon.com/Neural-
Machine-Translation-Philipp-Koehn/dp/1108497322)

[![Statistical Machine Translation - Philipp Koehn -

Machine Translation - Philipp Koehn - Book
Cover](https://omniscien.com/wp-
content/uploads/2020/07/61AHDbe8ymL._SX354_BO1204203200_1-214x300.jpg)](https://www.amazon.com/Statistical-
Machine-Translation-Philipp-Koehn/dp/0521874157)

![Translate](https://omniscien.com/wp-
content/uploads/2020/10/TranslateBrowser240min.png)

##  State-of-the-Art  Machine Translation

Secure Cloud, On-Premises, and Data Center scalability.

At the heart of all of Omniscien’s tools and products is [state-of-the-art
machine translation technology](machine-translation/index.html). Developed and
refined for over 14 years, the Omniscien team has continually strived to
innovate and deliver the highest quality translation output and most flexible
machine translation platform.

[Language Studio](products/language-studio/index.html) provides specialized
machine translation engines for use in [Media Studio](products/media-
studio/index.html) and [Workflow Studio](products/workflow-studio/index.html)
that are optimized for a specific purpose such as subtitle translation. The
complexity and power of these purpose-optimized workflows and machine
translation engines are hidden away with easy use tools and user interfaces.

Performing a translation is simple and easy. However, when you want to take
control, Language Studio provides workflow scripting and many more features
that place you in the driving seat.

No matter your performance and scalability need Language Studio has a platform
edition to match. Language Studio provides a wide range of machine translation
options and features to cover even the most complex of business use cases.

[Learn More](machine-translation/index.html)

![](https://omniscien.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/07/Products_300-1.png)

##  Custom  Machine Translation Engines

Customize to your own writing style, vocabulary, and context.

Generic translation systems such as Google are designed to deliver a gist or
general meaning for anything, anytime, and anyone **_so that text can be
understood_**.

 **Being able to understand is just not good enough at Omniscien!!**

Our goal is quite different with a much higher quality bar. Omniscien
customized machine translation engines are designed to deliver a translation
output that requires _**the least amount of human effort in order to
publish**_. When translation quality directly impacts the bottom line and
accuracy is important, a custom MT engine will always deliver the highest
quality translation output.

[Learn More](machine-translation/custom-mt-engines/index.html)

![](https://omniscien.com/wp-
content/uploads/2020/07/IndustryDomains-1-279x300.png)

##  Specialized  Industry Domains

Quality is delivered by a better understanding of context.

Unlike a human, machines cannot understand context (yet). The simple phrase “I
caught a virus” could refer to your personal health or to your computer.
Context can change the meaning to something totally different. Industry
domains provide the context needed for higher quality translations.

By training MT engines with the high-quality bilingual data that contains the
correct context, the context of the resulting translations is conveyed and the
quality of the translation is notably better.

[Learn More](machine-translation/industry-domains/index.html)

![](https://omniscien.com/wp-
content/uploads/2020/07/BigDataSources500-1-300x300.png)

##  Specialized Workflows Driven by Artificial Intelligence and Natural
Language Processing

Different business requirements can only be optimized by specialized workflows
and adaptation of tools and processes.

Omniscien products, such as [Media Studio](products/media-studio/index.html)
and [Language

as [Media Studio](products/media-studio/index.html)
and [Language Studio](products/language-studio/index.html), are optimized and
built for purpose. The tools that we use are available and can be readily
adapted to meet many different business needs. Our expansive library of
language processing tools, workflow automation technologies and artificial
intelligence solutions provide a unique platform from which to build
specialized solutions.

The Omniscien team will work with you to build workflows for language
processing, voice recognition, optical character recognition (OCR), data
mining, data analysis, and data automation or you can leverage our
technologies to build your own solutions.
